pageContext.claim: “What’s going on at @CNN is happening, to different degrees, at other networks - with @NBCNews being the worst. The good news is that Andy Lack(y) is about to be fired(?) for incompetence, and much worse. When Lester Holt got caught fudging my tape on Russia, they were hurt badly!”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence that Lester Holt did anything to the interview where Trump said he fired James Comey for the Russia investigation not the Clinton investigation.
